attributes.action: To sack or ask Maggie Atkinson to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the comments made by the childrens commissioner Maggie atkinson on the legal age age of children been prosecuted to the age of 12 and the incensitive comments she made about James Bulgers death we the tax payer the public and more importantly the voter want her to resign. Failing that we want her sacked.

rejection.details: The Children's Commissioner is independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
